orpheus1.speech: Jason, the fleece is no where to be seen here ?! Have we been betrayed ?
Deal with this dragon first and we shall venture on.
Your arrows are not effective here. The dragon is vunerable to your sword while i play my Lyre, keep an eye out and be careful.

medea1.speech: Jason, finally we have found the golden fleece
Defeat the dragon and reclaim it !
The dragon is vunerable to your arrows just after it lights the ground on fire, keep an eye out and be careful.
